title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder when selecting a dataset with set aliases
description: When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the set aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder after setting aliases for columns, the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder after setting aliases for columns, the aliases should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR:
1. Open the dataset containing columns that need aliases.
2. Set aliases for the columns.
3. Open the expression builder.
4. Select the dataset.
5. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases.
